channel.title: How to make an object give random items?
channel.description:
Heya, I'd like help with making an object give you random items when searched. Currently it's for Barrows, and the chest is 10284, wich makes it under case 10284.
I never done anything like this neither thought of it. But I know it's possible, but I got no knowledge of it. So any help would be really great! I searched a bit and found:
[code]int randItem = misc.random[/code]
It doesn't really tell me much... Also if there's a tutorial somewhere please tell me!
If you need more information notify me.
Sincerly, Dealman.

item.title: How to make an object give random items?
item.dc:creator: @huggies huggies
item.description:

Heya, I’d like help with making an object give you random items when searched. Currently it’s for Barrows, and the chest is 10284, wich makes it under case 10284.
